content.query:
WITH ORDERS AS (
    SELECT *       
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            /* 01. Definir o caminho do arquivo CSV */
            BULK 'https://dlsmartbi.dfs.core.windows.net/discosmarbi/raw/AdvWorks_Stage/orders.csv',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
        ) 
        WITH (

            /* 02. Definir formato dos dados COLLATE */
            SalesOrderID VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            SalesOrderDetailID VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            OrderDate VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            DueDate VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            ShipDate VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            EmployeeID VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            CustomerID VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            SubTotal VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            TaxAmt VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            Freight VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            TotalDue VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            ProductID VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,    
            OrderQty VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            UnitPrice VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            UnitPriceDiscount VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            LineTotal VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8
        )                    
        AS [result]
)


/* 04. Executar a consulta */
SELECT *
FROM ORDERS
